name: Bay Area Writing Project
description: Professional development for teachers in writing instruction and leadership
fullDescription: The Bay Area Writing Project at UC Berkeley provides professional development programs for teachers, helping educators improve writing instruction and student outcomes.
whatTheyOffer:
- Summer Invitational Institute (4-week program)
- Yearlong professional development
- Teacher leadership development
- Writing workshops and coaching
- Classroom-tested strategies
- Community of teacher-writers
howToGetIt:
1. Visit BAWP website for program information
2. Apply for Summer Invitational Institute or other programs
3. Describe your teaching context and goals
4. Attend program sessions
5. Join network of teacher-consultants
